house_listing.house_description: Beautiful, like new construction! Renovated twnhse style condos, 1 blk to chesapeake bay. 3rd flr mstr suite with loft/4th brm option. Choice of cpt & vinyl. Upgrades avail. Model includes many avail options. 100% financing available. Solid wood cabinets. Low condo fee. Individual water meters.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Fenced, Foyer, Loft, Walk-In Closet(s)
